Trade/Device Name(s): CLEVER CHOICE Auto-Code Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CLEVER CHOICE Auto-Code Pro Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CLEVER CHOICE Auto-Code Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement using electrochemical biosensor.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites as an aid for diabetes management at home or by healthcare professionals; not for diagnosis or screening and not for neonates.
